verses.roman:
tabe choṭa-vipra kahe, "śuna, mahājana
nyāya jinibāre kahe asatya-vacana

synonyms: tabe—at that time; choṭa-vipra—the young brāhmaṇa; kahe—says; śuna—please hear; mahā-jana—all gentlemen; nyāya—the argument; jinibāre—to win; kahe—he says; asatya-vacana—untruthful statements.
translation: At that time the young brāhmaṇa said, "My dear gentlemen, please hear. Just to gain victory in an argument, this man is lying.
